references: T. Pisanski, D. Schattschneider and B. Servatius, Applying Burnside's lemma to a one-dimensional Escher problem, Math. Mag., 79 (2006), 167-180. See V(n).
maple: A054611:=proc(n) local k, t1; t1:=0; for k in divisors(n) do t1 := t1+phi(k)*4^(n/k); od: t1; end;
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 16 2000
